import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from "./Layout"; import { urlOfImages } from "./images"; import fetch from 'isomorphic-fetch'; import ls from 'local-storage'; class QueryWithAns extends Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { question :{}, answers : [] } } async componentDidMount() { } async show(){ await fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/'+ls.get('obj_id')) .then(response => response.json()) .then((res)=>{ if(res.question){ this.setState({question : res.question, answers : res.question.answers});} else{ this.setState({question : res.question}); } localStorage.setItem('obj_id',''); }) } renderAnswer(){ if(this.state.answers && this.state.answers.length>0){ return (
{this.state.answers.map((answer)=>{ return(
{answer.answer}
-- {answer.author.name}
) })}
);} else{ return (
NO ONE ANSWERED IT
) } }; render(){ this.show(); return(
